product_name: Thule Vertex Swing 4 Bike Hitch Rack
long_description: The new arc design of the Thule Vertex Swing 4 bike hitch rack securely carries up to 4 bikes and offers greater distance between bikes and better ground clearance than previous Thule hitch racks.
short_description: The new arc design of the Thule Vertex Swing 4 bike hitch rack securely carries up to 4 bikes and offers greater distance between bikes and better ground clearance than previous Thule hitch racks.
